attributes.action: Make adequate sound insulation in residential properties compulsory and law.
attributes.background: Hundreds of thousands of residential dwellings in the UK are with inadequate sound insulation between flats, houses etc. This poses a major health risk to dwellers of such properties. Current laws need be changed in order to better protect people suffering as a result of inadequate sound insulation.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what you mean by adequate sound insulation.

There are already rules about the sound insulation required in buildings:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/resistance-to-sound-approved-document-e

You could start a new petition setting out the changes you would like to see.
